divs: Sighting DetailsSee the attached film by my cell-phone camera type Nokia 6111. No other video camera ,no telescope ...... Sighting position East Cairo city. Time 04.o am. Location building area and recorded on the street..? Altitude very low beteween the buildings and the trees. No indication for any atempt for landing. Speed unknown. Orbit and direction from east in lower altitude to southeast to higher altitude. No one notice that exept me even you can see on my film cars going on its way without stopping, instead of seeing me recorded the case....!!!!! Thanks. Dr.Wahid Ibrahim Egyptian Ufologist www.ufo-egyptian-hunter.org
trends: There have been 45 other sightings in Cairo

This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: This is Dr.Ibrahim------www.ufo-egyptian-hunter.org------While returned very early morning,noticed unusual bright blue glowing star very close very near I recorded by my cell-phone camera only,please see the short film(12m).Thanks.Dr.Ibrahim/Cairo-Egypt.
